priority_ranked_signals.title: EPA revokes CO2 endangerment finding — largest deregulation in US history
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Eliminates the central legal basis for all US federal climate regulation. Cascading global impact on climate governance, trade policy, and energy markets. Affects every sector of the economy.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Anthropic closes in on $20B round at $350B valuation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Signals continued exponential growth in foundational AI investment. $350B valuation exceeds many traditional industry leaders, indicating AI sector's massive capital absorption.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Last US-Russia nuclear arms control treaty set to expire
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Expiration of the last nuclear arms control framework between superpowers fundamentally changes the global security architecture, coinciding with Ukraine war escalation.

priority_ranked_signals.title: UN declares dawn of global water bankruptcy
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Global water crisis declaration represents a critical sustainability threshold affecting agriculture, energy production, and human settlements worldwide.

priority_ranked_signals.title: IBM: 2026 marks first quantum computer outperforming classical
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Quantum advantage milestone will disrupt cryptography, drug discovery, materials science, and financial modeling. Near-term commercialization implications.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Geoeconomic confrontation identified as world's top threat
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Systemic shift from military to economic statecraft as primary geopolitical weapon. Trade, sanctions, and industrial policy reshaping global economic order.

priority_ranked_signals.title: China clean energy drove one-third of 2025 GDP growth ($2.1T)
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Clean energy as primary economic growth driver demonstrates green transition's economic viability at scale. Reshapes global energy competition dynamics.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Personalized gene-editing: Baby KJ first recipient
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: First personalized gene therapy represents a paradigm shift in medicine — from one-size-fits-all to individualized genetic treatments. Ethical and regulatory implications massive.

priority_ranked_signals.title: EU AI Act delayed: high-risk obligations deferred to December 2027
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: EU's delay in implementing AI regulation creates a critical regulatory gap during rapid AI scaling. US-EU divergence in AI governance approaches widens.

priority_ranked_signals.title: US-born labor force to shrink: GDP growth impossible without immigration
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Structural demographic shift threatens economic growth model. Collides with immigration restriction policies, creating a fundamental policy contradiction.

priority_ranked_signals.title: First D-T fusion fuel cycle demonstration planned for late 2026
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Most critical milestone for practical fusion energy. If successful, fundamentally changes the long-term energy landscape and climate mitigation calculus.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Neuralink Blindsight: brain implant for vision restoration in humans
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Direct neural interface for sensory restoration represents a major BCI milestone with implications for disability, neurotechnology regulation, and human enhancement.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Half of world's coral reefs damaged: $9.8 trillion ecosystem at risk
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Coral reef collapse threatens marine biodiversity and coastal economies worth $9.8T annually. Irreversible damage with cascading ecological consequences.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Maine Lakes: Shorter Ice Seasons Signal Water Quality Crisis
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Climate-driven ice season shortening threatens water quality through algal blooms, combining environmental degradation with cultural loss. Tangible localized evidence of systemic climate impacts.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Greenland warmest January: warming 4x faster than global average
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Arctic amplification accelerating beyond projections. Greenland ice melt contributes to sea level rise threatening coastal populations globally.

priority_ranked_signals.title: North Korea UNC2970 using Google Gemini for cyber reconnaissance
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: State-sponsored use of commercial AI for offensive cyber operations opens new dimension of AI-enabled warfare. Raises urgent questions about dual-use AI governance.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AAP Challenges Kennedy HHS Unlawful Vaccine Policy Changes
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Institutional conflict between medical establishment and political appointees over vaccine policy represents a critical public health governance challenge with population-wide implications.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Storm Nils: Deadly Floods in France as Extreme Weather Events Accelerate
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Deadly flooding in France confirms accelerating extreme weather pattern in Western Europe. Immediate human casualties underscore urgency of climate adaptation infrastructure.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AgriFoodTech Trends 2026: AI Reshaping Food System Innovation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: AI transitioning from experimental add-on to essential food system infrastructure. Cross-sector transformation affecting food safety, agriculture, and supply chains.

priority_ranked_signals.title: NYC Chief Climate Officer Signals Urban Climate Governance Paradigm Shift
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Cities creating dedicated executive-level climate positions represents institutional innovation in climate governance, particularly relevant as federal climate action retreats.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Food Industry Losing Control of Its Future: 4 Warning Signals
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Four data signals suggest food industry at inflection point with market share shifts, technology adoption gaps, and regulatory pressure converging to reshape the sector.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Environmental Reporting Must Outlast the News Cycle: Africa Biodiversity
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Information asymmetry in African environmental reporting creates blind spots in global biodiversity monitoring. Signals need for expanded environmental information infrastructure.

priority_ranked_signals.title: FDA Rejects Disc Medicine Rare Disease Therapy
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: FDA regulatory caution in rare disease space despite expedited pathways signals ongoing tension between innovation acceleration and safety standards in biotechnology.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Mechanistic interpretability of AI models
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: AI interpretability research critical for safety and regulation. Understanding how AI models work internally is fundamental to trustworthy AI deployment.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Sodium-ion batteries breakthrough
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Alternative battery chemistry reduces lithium dependence and could democratize energy storage. Important for energy transition and supply chain diversification.

priority_ranked_signals.title: NVIDIA Rubin six-chip AI platform production
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Next-generation AI infrastructure platform will define AI computing capabilities for the next cycle. Critical for maintaining AI development pace.

priority_ranked_signals.title: CRISPR advancing xenotransplantation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: CRISPR-edited pig organs for human transplant could address chronic organ shortage. Represents convergence of gene editing and transplant medicine.

priority_ranked_signals.title: MIT robot Relevance framework: 90% accuracy
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Robot intent prediction enables safer human-robot collaboration. 90% accuracy milestone significant for industrial and service robotics deployment.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Runway AI video startup raises $315M at $5.3B valuation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: AI video generation investment surge reflects growing confidence in world models and generative AI content creation capabilities.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Modal Labs AI inference in talks at $2.5B valuation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: AI inference infrastructure becoming its own investment category, signaling maturation of AI deployment stack beyond training.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Cisco Silicon One G300 for AI infrastructure
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Networking infrastructure specifically designed for AI workloads indicates AI-driven transformation of enterprise networking architecture.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Tensor Level 4 autonomous vehicle
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Level 4 autonomous vehicle milestone advances toward full self-driving capability with implications for transportation, logistics, and urban planning.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Passwordless authentication inflection point
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Shift away from passwords represents fundamental change in digital identity and security architecture, especially urgent with quantum computing advances.

priority_ranked_signals.title: DMTF1 protein for brain cell rejuvenation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Brain cell rejuvenation mechanism discovery could transform neurodegenerative disease treatment. Early-stage but high potential impact.

priority_ranked_signals.title: 99.93% neutral-atom qubit readout fidelity
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Near-perfect qubit readout is key requirement for quantum error correction. Enables practical quantum computing advancement.

priority_ranked_signals.title: BCI patent surge: Neuralink, Synchron lead
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Patent surge indicates BCI industry transitioning from research to commercialization phase. Multiple companies competing signals market maturation.

priority_ranked_signals.title: WIPO: Global innovation geography shifting
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Shifting innovation geography reflects structural changes in global R&D capacity and technology leadership competition.

priority_ranked_signals.title: OECD: global GDP cooling to 2.9%
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Slowing global growth amid trade tensions and geopolitical uncertainty creates challenging environment for business and investment planning.

priority_ranked_signals.title: IMF: global growth steady at 3.3%
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: IMF assessment provides baseline economic outlook but highlights downside risks from trade policy and geopolitical tensions.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Global economy slows; digital divide widens
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Economic slowdown combined with widening digital divide threatens inclusive development and exacerbates Global South challenges.

priority_ranked_signals.title: US patents drop 9%; Asia holds 60% globally
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: US patent decline signals potential erosion of innovation leadership, while Asia's dominance reshapes global technology competition landscape.

priority_ranked_signals.title: EV marketplace Ever raises $31M
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: EV marketplace investment signals maturation of EV ecosystem beyond manufacturing into services and distribution platforms.

priority_ranked_signals.title: H-1B weighted selection rule
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Wage-weighted H-1B selection restructures skilled immigration toward higher-paid positions, affecting tech industry talent pipeline.

priority_ranked_signals.title: H-2B visa expansion: 64,716 additional visas
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Visa expansion reflects recognition of labor shortages in seasonal industries despite broader immigration restriction rhetoric.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Amsterdam and Florence ban fossil fuel ads
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: City-level fossil fuel advertising bans represent emerging regulatory trend with potential to spread across European cities.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Swedish youth climate litigation
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Youth climate litigation continuing to establish legal precedents for government accountability on climate commitments.

priority_ranked_signals.title: WHO Pandemic Agreement IGWG meeting Feb 9-14
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Pandemic preparedness treaty negotiations represent critical multilateral health governance effort with implications for future outbreak response.

priority_ranked_signals.title: WHO pandemic preparedness assessment
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Ongoing pandemic preparedness evaluation informs global health security infrastructure investment and policy priorities.

priority_ranked_signals.title: WHO $1B 2026 emergency appeal
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: WHO emergency funding appeal reflects scale of ongoing global health emergencies and funding gap challenges.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Global health funding cuts warning
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Health funding reductions threaten pandemic preparedness and routine health services, particularly in developing nations.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Americans negative economic views persist
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Persistent negative economic sentiment despite macro indicators creates political uncertainty and affects consumer behavior patterns.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Menopause brain structure changes revealed
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Novel research on menopause-related brain changes advances understanding of gender-specific health needs and aging research.

priority_ranked_signals.title: SBTi validates 10,000 company climate targets
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: 10,000 companies with validated climate targets shows growing corporate commitment, though implementation gap remains significant.
